definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: According to Marxist theory, the Concept of Life and Death is exactly the World Outlook.
sentences.chinese: 按照马克思主义的说法，生死观就是世界观。

sentences.english: To remould one's world outlook involves arduous struggle.
sentences.chinese: 改造世界观需要进行艰苦的斗争。

sentences.english: I am not able, and I do not want, completely to abandon the world-view that I acquired in childhood.
sentences.chinese: 我不能，也不愿意完全放弃我在童年时养成的世界观。

sentences.english: I am not able, and I do not want, completely to abandon the world-view that I acquired in chil.
sentences.chinese: 我不能，也不愿意完全放弃我在童年时养成的世界观。

sentences.english: Is your view of the world gloomy?
sentences.chinese: 你的世界观是悲观的吗？

sentences.english: It is obvious that the issue of Weltanschauung has been becoming one of the most important subjects in western philosophy for more than hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 世界观问题是一百多年来西方哲学的重要话题之一。

sentences.english: Marxist philosophy is scientific world outlook and methodology of proletariats.
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义哲学是无产阶级的科学的世界观和方法论。

sentences.english: Apologetics vindicates and justifies the Bible's worldview with adequate reasons and evidences.
sentences.chinese: 护教为《圣经》的世界观提出足够的支持理由。

sentences.english: That sort of Libertarian world view is both unrealistic and, frankly, silly.
sentences.chinese: 那种自由主义的世界观既不现实，也是低级愚蠢的。

sentences.english: But I did change Maya's perspective for at least that evening.
sentences.chinese: 但我确实改变了Maya至少在那晚上的世界观。

sentences.english: They are being digitally remembered with our world view overlaid on top.
sentences.chinese: 我们对世界观正在被数字化记忆所覆盖。

sentences.english: During the life of university you can develop your philosophy and Weltanschauung.
sentences.chinese: 可以在此期间初步形成自己的人生观和世界观。
开始摒除死亡主义世界观。

sentences.english: In this way, we can reflect the noble outlook on life, world outlook and values.
sentences.chinese: 这样便可体现出君主高尚的人生观，世界观和价值观。

sentences.english: But not so in the Christian world view.
sentences.chinese: 但在圣经的世界观里，是有对与错，真与假。

sentences.english: Infertility can totally derail the vision you shared for your future.
sentences.chinese: 男性不育症可能会完全改变你未来的世界观。

definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
methodology/Discours de la méthode by René Descartes 笛卡兒|笛卡儿[Di2 ka3 er2], 1637
epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
